text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Time flies by as I enjoy my trial<n>period as Tamamo
Cross's trainer.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Phew... Well? How was that lap?
choice_data_list: You beat your best time again!
You beat your best time again!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Aw yes! And I'm not tired at all!<n>Lookin' good, me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems our hard days of training are<n>paying off, and she's
feeling herself<n>get stronger. But before the tryouts, I<n>want
to try one more thing.
choice_data_list: How about testing your skills in a scrimmage?
How about testing your skills in a scrimmage?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: A li'l test before the real deal, yeah?Good idea! I wanna see what I'mreally made of!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Considering her growth, she should<n>have this in the bag, but
we can still<n>use this opportunity to refine her form<n>and
strategy.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Or, at least, that was the plan.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Gotta win, gotta win, gotta win! If I<n>don't, I'm just a...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's the final stretch, with our lead still<n>setting the pace! Will
anyone be able<n>to overtake her?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
No! Why?! C'mon, legs, don't give up<n>on me now! We gotta
do dis!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross speeds up, but she<n>can't pass the lead!
Has she run out<n>of energy?! The lead remains the<n>same
and... we have a winner!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
What was supposed to be an easy<n>warm-up before the real
deal turns out<n>to be a fight to even place fifth...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: What the hell... Why, after all that<n>work, am I still garbage?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Sorry, but I'm callin' it a day. I needa<n>cool off.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I decide to take a walk. As I stroll<n>about, I try to figure out
the reason<n>behind Tamamo Cross's inability to<n>unleash
her strength during that last<n>race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I look up, I realize I'm in the same<n>park where I met
Tamamo Cross. And<n>just like that time, I can hear the<n>
sound of children playing.

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Over here, Tama!

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: Hurry, hurry!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Geez, I didn't come here to play, ya<n>know. You're all lucky
you're<n>adorable. Can't say no to—

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I guess. This park reminds me of the<n>one near my house
back home. So<n>when I'm down in the dumps, I'll<n>come
here to clear my head.

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: Tama? Whatcha doing?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Gimme a minute, guys—we're havin'<n>a chat over here! Go
on, have fun<n>without me!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: ...The kids here are around the same<n>age as my siblings.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I wonder how the little scoundrels are<n>doin'... Same goes for
my folks...<n>Hope they're holdin' up okay.
choice_data_list: Sounds like family's important to you.
Sounds like family's important to you.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Yeah... More than anythin'.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
If I'm bein' honest, we're not<n>exactly swimmin' in money,
but that<n>didn't matter to us. Everyone was<n>always
smiling, and every day was a<n>blast.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Thing is... supportin' us costs money,<n>so Mom and Dad
work themselves to<n>the bone every day... I couldn't just<n>
sit around and let them handle<n>everythin'.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross's Brother
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Tama! Let's buy some candy!<n>I'm super hungry right
now!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, ya know we can't afford it.<n>'Sides, tonight's dinner
is... grilled fish<n>cakes! You sure you wanna fill up on<n>
sweets?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross's Sister
text_block_list.text: Wow! Tama's makin' grilled fish<n>cakes?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross's Brother
text_block_list.text: All right! You're right, Tama. I gotta<n>save room!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
That's what I like to hear! Now let's<n>get goin'. Mom and
Dad are waitin'<n>for us back home!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: (Just you wait, kiddos. Someday I'llbuy you as much candy as you want,and we'll be chowin' down on grilled steaks for dinner!)

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
After that, I got to thinkin' up ways I<n>could make my
family's dreams come<n>true. And eventually I landed on the<n>
Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: If I can win all the races, I'll be superfamous, right? And with that comescash. After that, I'll be able tobuy whatever my family wants!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
My folks worked hard to get me into<n>this academy, so I
gotta make it worth<n>the price! That's why I gotta win!<n>
But...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: With my crappy runnin', not only am Ilosin', but I'm losing bad. I gottaadmit it's a li'l... frustratin'.

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: ...Tama? What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Whatcha doin' here, ya little<n>rascals? I thought I told
youse guys to<n>go play.

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: But we wanna see you run! Show us<n>how fast you are!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
For cryin' out loud... You just think of<n>me as a toy,
don'tcha? A'ight, but<n>just this once. Back up, everybody!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ready, set... Hup!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross blasts off with a<n>ferocity that seems to send
a crackle<n>through the air. Yes, just like before...<n>she is the
lightning disrupting the<n>evening sky.

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text:
Whoooa! Tama, you got even faster!<n>You were like,
"BOOM!"

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Yeah! And it looks like a blast!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
It sure does, yeah?! Dat's why they<n>call me "White
Lightning!"

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Well, it started with something my dad<n>said. He told me
seein' me zoomin'<n>around havin' a blast was like<n>
watchin' a streak of white lightning.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
My whole family's convinced White<n>Lightning's gonna
destroy the<n>competition to become the fastest in<n>Japan...
And I don't wanna prove 'em<n>wrong.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Could those words be the key to<n>what's holding her back?
